description: Rear Garden T1 - Apple Tree - reduce by 2-3m overall. T2 - Bird Cherry Tree - Reduce height by 4m, remove bough rubbing on fence. T3 - Gilder Rose - Reduce by 3m in height, cut back to boundary line overhang approx. 2m. T4 Willow Tree - Reduce left hand side of Tree as viewed from rear of House which is growing through and over the top of the Prunus Tree, by approx. 5m to give clearance to the Prunus Tree. Remove overhang over the Neighbours garden to the rear approx. 2m off. All works to control size of Trees and cause minimum interference for Neighbours light issues etc.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
site_name: The Rectory, 2 The Green Walk, Chingford, London, E4 7ER
